ESP_Profile_Extract_SurfacePatch — YYYYYYY¶

This module provides YYYYY.

Module Syntax¶

Usage:

python ESP_Profile_Extract_SurfacePatch.py --pdb=<path> --coord=<[x,y,z]> --sphere-radius=<number>
Additional options:
  • –dx=True, if this if True, it looks for the files ‘_vdw-PE0.dx’ and ‘*_esp-PE0.dx’, where ‘‘ is the pdb_name.
  • –meshsize=<meshsize_in_x_y_z>

Module Contents¶

class ESP_Profile_Extract_SurfacePatch.ESP_Profile_Extract_SurfacePatch(object)¶

This class extracts the surface patch, which lies inside the volume of a sphere around the given coordinates, in form a ‘.dx’ file, which then contains the esp-values on the vdw surface.

The extracted ‘.dx’ file will be saved with the extension: ‘_extract_sp.dx’, where ‘‘ stands for the pdb_name without the’.pdb’.
